title: internal compiler error: subnode not addable
body:
by **jessta**: 
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?

package main

func main() {
        var buff [255]complex128
        t := real(buff[5]) //bug
        _ = t

}

2. What is the full compiler output?
e.go:5: internal compiler error: subnode not addable


3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
8g version 5477
